backend/main.mo: Defines actor with companion profiles, booking requests, messages, monetization config, and access control plus related types and maps.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic copying actor state while enforcing a 30% commission monetization config.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking admin UI commission-rate feature to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files across pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global layout, guards, and route definitions for public, authenticated, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSta: Renders a styled badge showing a companion profileâ€™s status based on enum value.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that clears React Query cache on logout and handles auth errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save an initial user profile.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Dialog component for submitting a booking request, including form fields, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/companions/Compa: Displays a companion profile card with image, name, description, category, and location, linking to the profile page.
Image gallery with clickable thumbnails and a modal viewer supporting navigation and close actions.
frontend/src/components/compliance/AgeGa: Modal that requires users to confirm they are 18+ or decline and exit the site.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Wrapper that restricts content to authenticated admin users, showing login, loading, or denial states.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAg: Gatekeeper component that checks localStorage for age confirmation and shows the age verification modal if needed.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Protects content by requiring user authentication and prompts login if not signed in.
frontend/src/components/layout/Editorial: Provides styled editorial layout elements including section, headline, subhead, and divider components.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, legal links, browse links, and a caffeine.ai attribution line.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation, login button, admin/user links, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to get user role and admin status using react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context/provider with login, logout, and identity restoration via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many react-query hooks for profiles, bookings, and earnings, wrapping backend actor calls and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles including serif font import.
frontend/src/lib/errorFormatting.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly strings for authorization, fee, and existence errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingDet: Admin page showing detailed booking info with controls to update booking status and refresh earnings data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin bookings list with tab-based filtering and navigation to individual booking detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEarningsPa: Displays platform earnings, active monetization model, and recent completed bookings using fetched earnings, config, and bookings data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMonetizati: Loads and edits monetization config, allowing admins to select a revenue model and update related fee parameters.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfileEdi: Provides a form to create or edit a profile, preloading existing data and submitting updates via API.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfilesPa: Lists all profiles with status controls and navigation to create or edit profiles.
Lists active companion profiles with search, category, and city filters and displays results in a responsive grid.
Shows a detailed companion profile with gallery, details, and booking dialog trigger, handling missing profiles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature highlights, and calls to action linking to the browse page.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesConv: Shows a message thread between two participants, handles sending new messages, and manages loading or error states.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesInbo: Displays a user's message inbox by loading message threads, filtering unique counterparts, and linking to conversation pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyCompanionProfilePag: Form page for creating or editing a companion profile, handling identity lookup, validation, and profile submission.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, storage, rights, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/TermsDisclaimerPage.t: Static terms and disclaimer page covering age requirements, legality, liability, and booking rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing scope, features, architectural notes, and metadata for version tracking.
